maqras.text: 70|19|pitabrakd nasa  mnoussa lok trauv ban ke bangkeut laeng  daoy kmean kar atthmot laey .
70|20|daoy ke mean kdei pruoybaromph nowpel del krohakrak  ban kaetlaeng champoh ke .
70|21|haey ke bercha kamnanh  nowpel delke ban ttuol ban  phl la( meanotropy sa mb tde) .
70|22|leuklengte banda anak del brate b tde sa la t bonnaoh .
70|23|del puokke brakean khchab nung kar brate b tde sa la t robsa ke  cheanichch .
70|24|ning banda anak del tropy sa mb tde robsa puokke ku mean setthi ( mean chamnek) del trauv ban ke kamnt( aoy brichcheak pheaktean)
70|25|samreab anakakr del han som  ning anakakr del min han som .
70|26|ning banda anak del chuecheak leu thngai chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) .
70|27|ning banda anak del kaotakhlach tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa  puokke .
70|28|pitabrakd nasa  tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa puokke ku kmean  anaknea mneak mean sovotthephap laey .
70|29|ning banda anak del ban theroksaa bradeab phet robsa puokke ( pi ampeu hsai na) .
70|30|leuklengte champoh phriyea robsa puokke  ning khnhom bamreu srei  dachthlai del now kraom karokrobkrong robsa puokke bonnaoh . haey  pitabrakd nasa  puokke min trauv ban ke yk tosapei laey .
70|31|anaknea haey del ban svengork kar te  r k traaeal krawpi (braponth  ning khnhom bamreu dachthlai)noh  puok teangnoh haey kuchea puok del  ban lmeusa( nung bt b nhnh tde robsa a l laoh) .
70|32|haey banda anak del theroksaa nouv pheap smaohtrang  ning kar  sanyea robsa puokke .
70|33|ning banda anak del brakean khchab( daoy you tde thmr) knong kar  thveusaeaksaei robsa puokke .
70|34|haeyning banda anak del theroksaa nouv kar brate b tde sa lat  robsa puokke .
70|35|anak teangnoh haey  kuchea anak del trauv ke leukatamkeung now  knong thansuokr .
70|36|tae hetoaveibeanchea puok kmean chomnue branhab branhal chhpaohtow  kan anak
70|37|teang khangosdam  ning khangchevng chea krom  dau che  neah
70|38|tae real  bokkol knongchamnaom puokke mean bamnng chaul than  suokr na ai m ryy
70|39|min dauchnaoh te.  pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban bangkeut puokke  ampi avei del puokke ban doeng srab( tukkeam) .

70|40|yeung sbath nung mcheasa krobkrong( a l laoh sbath nung khluoneng)  kanleng del preahatity ning preah chnt reah  ning kanleng del preahatity ning  preah chnt lich tha  pitabrakd nasa yeung kuchea anak del mean anoupheap
70|41|leu kar chomnuosa krom phe  sa ng del la cheang puokke towtiet  haey kmean anaknea mneak ach yokachhneah yeung ban laey .

70|42|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) bandaoy aoy puokke lichalng ( knong pheap v nge  v ng)  ning lengsaech rhautadl puokke chuobnung thngai robsa  puokke del trauv ke sanyea thveutearounakamm( now thngai barlok) choh .
70|43|ku now thngai del puokke chenhpi phnaur yeang luen brieb dauchchea  puokke chhpaoh towkean roubsaamnak del puokke ban bangkeut daembi korp  sakkar( nowknong lokey) .
70|44|phnek robsa puokke tomleak choh  khn del kar lombak krobadandab puokke .  noh kuchea thngai del puokke trauv ban ke sanyea .
71|1|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchoun nuo h towkean krom robsa  ke( daoy banhchea tha)  chaur anak dasatuen promean krom robsa anak moun  nung tearounakamm da chhucheab thleak mk leu puokke .
71|2|ke( nuo h) ban pol tha  ao krom robsakhnhom.  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chea anak dasatuen promean da pitabrakd samreab puok anak .
71|3|chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh  ning kaotakhlach trong  haeyning brate b tde tam khnhom

71|4|trong nung aphytosa dl puok anak nouv real babakamm robsa puok anak  haey trong nung ponyearpel aoy puok anak( mean ayouveng)rhaut  dlpel muoy delke ban kamnt .  pitabrakd nasa karkamnt  robsa a l laoh  kalna vea mokadl  ku ke min ponyearpel laey  brasenbae puok anak ban doeng .
71|5|ke( nuo h) ban pol tha  ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom ban ampeavneav krom robsakhnhom( aoy towkean pheap mean chomnue)teangoyb  teang thngai .
71|6|te kar ampeavneav robsakhnhom min banthem avei dl puokke laey  ku mean  te thveu aoy puokke rtkech themtiet bonnaoh .

71|7|haey pit bra dk nasa  real pel del khnhom ampeavneav puokke  daembi trong nung aphytosa dl puokke noh  puokke bercha yk mream  dai robsa puokke nhok trachiek robsa puokke  ning yk saamliekbampeak  robsa puokke krob leu moukh  themtang ban b nd kar brachheang  ning kraeut  kr tm yeang khlang tiet phng .
71|8|banteabmk  khnhom pitchea ban ampeavneav puokke daoychamh r
71|9|kraoyomk  khnhom pitchea ban brakeasabrab puokke chea satharn  ning( chuonkal) daoy sngiemosngat .
71|10|ruochamk khnhom ban pol tha  chaur puok anak som aphytosa pi mcheasa  robsa puok anak  pitabrakd nasa  trong chea anak aphytosa bamphot .
71|11|trong nung banhchouh tukaphlieng cheachraen mk aoy puok anak .
71|12|haey trong nung banthem tropy sa mb tde ning kaunchaw cheachraen dl  puok anak  ning bratan chamkar damnam cheachraen aoy puok anak  haeyka bratan  t ne  l cheachraen aoy puok anak der .
71|13|tae hetoaveibeanchea puok anak min kaotakhlach pheap thkomthkaeng robsa  a l laoh
71|14|daoy trong pitchea ban bangkeut puok anakchea damnak ( pi tuk  kam rhaut klaycha roubreang penhlenh) noh
71|15|tae anak min bankheunh te tha  tae a l laoh ban bangkeut mekh  brapir chean tam rieb leu knea
71|16|haey trong ban bangkeut preah chnt chea ponlu  ning ban bangkeut  preahatity chea changkieng nowknong vea( mekh) yeang dauch me  d ch khleah
71|17|haey a l laoh ban bangkeut theato daem robsa puok anak ampi dei .
71|18|banteabmk  trong nung thveu aoy anak vilotralb tow knong dei vinh  haey trong ka b po  ch nh puok anak pi vea vinh phng der( now thngai barlok) .
71|19|haey a l laoh ban bangkeut phendei chea kamreal samreab puok  anak
71|20|daembi aoy puok anak ach thveudamnaer leu vea tamophlauv cheachraen  del toulomtouleay .

71|21|nuo h ban pol tha  ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  pitabrakd nasa puok  ke ban brachheang nung khnhom  themtang ban thveuteam anak del tropy sa mb tde  robsa ke  ning kaunchaw robsa ke minban banthem avei dl ke krawpi pheap khat  bng tiet phng .
71|22|haey puokke ban riebcham lbichakl muoy da thom .

71|23|haey puokke ban niyeay( towkean knea ke) tha  chaur puok anak  kom baohbng preah neanea robsa puok anak  ning kom baohbng preah vea d  ning saouvea k  ning yea hkausa  ning yea aouk  ning na sa  aoy saoh .
71|24|haey chea karpit nasa  preah teangnoh ban thveu aoy mnoussa  cheachraen v nge  v ng .  saum trong me tda kom banthem avei dl puok del bampean kraw  pi pheap v nge  v ng ei  v .
71|25|daoysaarte babakamm teanglay robsa puokke  puokke trauv  ban ke ponlich( knong tukchomnn)  ruoch trauv ban ke banhchoul tow knong nork .  haey puokke kmean anaknea chuoy krawpi a l laoh laey  .
71|26|nuo h ban pol tha  ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum trong me tda kom touk  aoy puok kmean chomnue na mneak rsanow leu phendei nih ei  v .

71|27|pitabrakd nasa  brasenbae trong touk chivit aoy puokke puokke  nung thveu aoy khnhom robsa trong v nge  v ng cheaminkhan .  haey puokke min bangkeut kraw  pi kaun del akrak  ning brachheang( nung trong) noh laey .

71|28|ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum trong me tda aphytosa dl khnhom ning  aupoukamdeay robsakhnhom  ning anak del ban chaul knong phteah robsakhnhom daoyman  chomnue( nung trong)  ning banda anak del mean chomnue brosasrei phng . haey  saum trong me tda kom banthem avei dl puok del bampean krawpi pheap vineasa ei  v .
